Name: Lost Souls
About the game: Lost Souls takes you and your friends on an epic adventure! In single player mode, you can test yourself by passing the most difficult tests: Gather supplies - craft powerful weapons to fight against various opponents. - build a temporary shelter to take a breath from the huge number of deaths. Explore the dungeon - study each level carefully, as you may miss something valuable. - before studying the level, I recommend storing the extracted loot in the chest Fight monsters - each enemy has its own unique characteristics and loot - with each level, the enemy is smarter and more dangerous: come up with different tactics Skills - Become a tank with a lot of health and stone skin - Become a magician with a different number of abilities and destroy hordes of enemies with one glance. - Get a lot of resources with just one touch Trade - There are many unique merchants who will gladly sell valuable items - each merchant is unique Treasures - Find mountains of gold to trade - Somewhere in the dungeon you can find a unique weapon. - The caches are full of different potions and resources. Multiplayer An open world with a lot of dungeons (but they still need to be found) also waiting for you beautiful Graphics [*unusual atmosphere[/h2] [*secret events[/h2] interesting Dungeons various Enemies & Bosses various Treasure Caches And Much More
